column4: so is there any GUI irc client for ubuntu that would automatically highlight whole message that contain my nick?
XChat
could you please tell me how I could select/change the colour?
in the preferences
or Settings, don't know how it is called in English
I just want to change the colour. it's red now. no idea how to do it
I have an spanish version, so maybe the names of the menus/options are different, but it should be: Configuration -> Preferences -> Colors
I was there before but ..
but?
if I write something it's in grey. if you write something and there is my nick it's in red. I just want to change the colours
your nick in bold but not the message. I want event the message to be in bold
you can change the colours, but I don't think you can make the whole message bold
so what's the colour name for highlighted message?
text colours got some numbers do you know what they mean?
below that there should be more colours without number
only for marking text and interface colours
below interface colours, the first one of the right column
let's try
it's not that one :(
I found it!
looking forward .... ;-)
text colors, second row, sixth one
you're RIGHT!!! but there is no description :-(
